author: ajsutton
content: Also nethermind doesn't download historic receipts and blocks by default which is a very selfish approach - if everyone did that we'd lose the chain history.  It also causes a lot of problems with eth2 clients which need to read those historic receipts. The configuration can be changed but then it will start using a bunch more disk.
